author: norswap
content: what is a good introductory page on light client that I can link to introduce the concept?

author: dtb_
content: Lodestar (the only live light client) has a write up on it here: https://medium.com/chainsafe-systems/lodestar-releases-light-client-prototype-40f300361c65 or the sync protocol spec, if you want to know the technical basics: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/altair/sync-protocol.md

author: dtb_
content: if you're looking for something less technical, i have a WIP that assumes ethereum knowledge but attempts to keep it introductory (e.g., briefly touches on PoS etc and is very general about Altair/sync): https://hackmd.io/@dtb/HJOEaJPwt
